p: According to the spatio-temporal analysis of human cases, six clusters were identified. There were two clusters in the first wave ( Fig 4: W1-1 and W1-2). One was in Nanjing city and its surrounding area (W1-1) where the onset date of the first patient of this cluster was 19 March 2013, while the other was in Nanchang city (W1-2), Jiangxi province where the onset date of the first patient in the cluster was 17 April 2013.
